author: hiasr
content:
The first version of the witness estimation has been finished! 

Currently, it does not take the selective passing of code chunks into account. 
If the code of a contract gets accessed, it is assumed to need all the code.
I thought about using the callTracer in order to get a better estimation for the usage, however this has not been done yet.
If anyone has another idea to efficiently determine the amount of code chunks accessed or other remarks regarding the approach used, please let me know!

author: hiasr
content: For the people who just want the results:
